results.title: Protective effect of metformin against walker 256 tumor growth is not dependent on metabolism improvement.
results.text_hl: After the end of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, the control and @CHEMICAL_Sodium_Glutamate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012970 @@@MSG@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, treated or untreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, were grafted with @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_256_Walker</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002279 @@@Walker 256 carcinoma@@@ cells.

results.title: Metformin reduces the Walker-256 tumor development in obese-MSG rats via AMPK and FOXO3a.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduces the @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_256_Walker</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002279 @@@Walker-256 tumor@@@ development in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@-@CHEMICAL_Sodium_Glutamate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012970 @@@MSG@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ via @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ and @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_294515 @@@FOXO3a@@@.

citations.NLM: de Queiroz EA, Akamine EH, de Carvalho MH, Sampaio SC, Fortes ZB. Metformin reduces the Walker-256 tumor development in obese-MSG rats via AMPK and FOXO3a. Life Sci. 2015 Jan 15;121():78-87. PMID: 25497710

results.title: Early treatment with metformin induces resistance against tumor growth in adult rats.
results.text_hl: We tested the hypothesis that @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ cell growth can be inhibited by early treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. For this purpose, adult @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ chronically treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in adolescence or in adulthood were inoculated with @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_256_Walker</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002279 @@@Walker 256 carcinoma@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Trombini AB, Franco CC, Miranda RA, de Oliveira JC, Barella LF, Prates KV, de Souza AA, Pavanello A, Malta A, Almeida DL, Tófolo LP, Rigo KP, Ribeiro TA, Fabricio GS, de Sant'Anna JR, Castro-Prado MA, de Souza HM, de Morais H, Mathias PC. Early treatment with metformin induces resistance against tumor growth in adult rats. Cancer Biol Ther. 2015;16(6):958-64. PMID: 26024008

results.title: Metformin treatment modulates the tumour-induced wasting effects in muscle protein metabolism minimising the cachexia in tumour-bearing rats
results.text_hl: Legend: C, control @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@; W, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_256_Walker</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002279 @@@Walker 256 tumour@@@-bearing @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@; M, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (33 mg/Kg); WM, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_256_Walker</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002279 @@@Walker 256 tumour@@@-bearing @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (33 mg/Kg).
